table.name: testTable1
table.definition: CREATE TABLE testTable1 ( testColumn1 INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, testColumn2 VARCHAR (16) NOT NULL, testColumn3 SMALLINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 12, PRIMARY KEY (testColumn1), UNIQUE KEY (testColumn1, testColumn2), KEY (testColumn3) );

table.name: testTable2

update.query: ALTER TABLE testTable2 DROP COLUMN testColumn7;
ALTER TABLE testTable2 DROP COLUMN testColumn6;
